title: The Vetta logo - is this a font?
content:
Is the Vetta logo a specially drawn font? Can anyone suggestion some similar ones? Cheers

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [vetta.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040234/http:/typophile.com/files/vetta.jpg) | 20.96 KB |
author: suebush

comments.content: Considering the tagline "peak creative prowess", I'd say custom work based on [Avant-Garde Gothic Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040234/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_avant_garde_gothic_pro_virtual/) ("a" redrawn from "o", "t" from rotated "j" or "f", "e" rotated...).

Take a look at all those fonts in the following link:

[http://www.identifont.com/list?3+Bauhaus+3+N7+7+68L+7+P1T+4+6IO+4+6CV+4+...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040234/http:/www.identifont.com/list?3+Bauhaus+3+N7+7+68L+7+P1T+4+6IO+4+6CV+4+OVA+3+NHR+3+LZQ+3+ILY+3+77J+3+A5L+3+3GX+3+23X+3+CFR+3+3V0+3+5Z4+3+1MU+3+517+3+51D+3+KJ3+3+8YS+3+4CJ+2+NOF+2+BOP+2+6DC+2+H0+2+6EC+2+24U+2 "http://www.identifont.com/list?3+Bauhaus+3+N7+7+68L+7+P1T+4+6IO+4+6CV+4+OVA+3+NHR+3+LZQ+3+ILY+3+77J+3+A5L+3+3GX+3+23X+3+CFR+3+3V0+3+5Z4+3+1MU+3+517+3+51D+3+KJ3+3+8YS+3+4CJ+2+NOF+2+BOP+2+6DC+2+H0+2+6EC+2+24U+2")
